title: Watch NOVELISTS' Moody New Music Video for New Single, “Say My Name”
description: The French metal band don't hold back on their newest single, "Say My Name." The post Watch NOVELISTS' Moody New Music Video for New Single, “Say My Name” appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: The French metal band don't hold back on their newest single, "Say My Name."
text: Deceptively melodic at the beginning and deviously complex in the middle, French metal band NOVELISTS play with expansive sounds on their newest single, "Say My Name." Their new album, CODA, is due out on May 16th via ACKOR music, a record label founded by members of both NOVELISTS and LANDMVRKS. With progressive and melodic elements littered throughout the metal band's sound, the band's recent addition of front woman Camille Contreras breathes energy into their newest material. The band have previously released singles, "All For Nothing," "Coda," and "K.O." with another music video accompanying "Coda." NOVELISTS' newest single offers raging dirty vocals and a passionate guitar solo. Check out the band's newest music video above, pre-order and pre-save the album here, and check out the album's tracklist below. html:
Deceptively melodic at the beginning and deviously complex in the middle, French metal band NOVELISTS play with expansive sounds on their newest single, "Say My Name."

Their new album, CODA, is due out on May 16th via ACKOR music, a record label founded by members of both NOVELISTS and LANDMVRKS.

With progressive and melodic elements littered throughout the metal band's sound, the band's recent addition of front woman Camille Contreras breathes energy into their newest material.

The band have previously released singles, "All For Nothing," "Coda," and "K.O." with another music video accompanying "Coda."

NOVELISTS' newest single offers raging dirty vocals and a passionate guitar solo. Check out the band's newest music video above, pre-order and pre-save the album here, and check out the album's tracklist below.

CODA Tracklist

  1. Say My Name
  2. Coda
  3. All For Nothing
  4. Maldición de la Bruja
  5. In Heaven
  6. Adam and Eve
  7. Sleepless Nights
  8. 78 rue…
  9. CRC
  10. K.O.
